attributes.action: press for immediate deployment of a substantial EU force in support of UN peacekeepers in eastern Congo, commit immediate resources for humanitarian and development activities and intensify diplomatic efforts to achieve a regional political solution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned urge Her Majesty’s Government to
1 press for the immediate deployment of a substantial EU force in support of the existing overstretched UN Chapter 7 peacekeeping force (MONUC) in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo. The experience of the EU’s Operation Artemis in 2003 in protecting civilians in the city of Bunia should be taken into account.
2 commit immediate resources both from DFID and through the EU to humanitarian relief and development activities in eastern DRC.
3 intensify diplomatic activities to achieve a regional political solution to the insecurity affecting eastern DRC.
Statements up to now by Foreign Office ministers show that they are active on the third of these points, but the urgency and gravity of the situation require action in the sequence of this petition if security is to be restored and lives saved.
